firstNightReminder: The Rampage chooses 3 players
otherNightReminder: If the Rampage nominated and executed 1 of the TARGET players today, all of them might die.
name: Rampage
ability: On your first night, choose 3 players: the first time you nominate & execute 1 of them, they all might die tonight.

jinxes.reason: If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Rampage ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.
